fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Sue someone each night. The next day, they choose one:
> - Settle the case, paying you one tier of defense. (They permanently lose it and you permanently gain it.)
> - Get a lawyer, who they have to pay one tier of defense. They have a 50% chance of winning the case, in which case you have to pay them one tier of defense. Otherwise, they have to pay you an ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Everything is processed exactly as written.
- If someone goes below Vulnerable defense due to your ability, they die.
